article_title: Kentucky's 2012 poverty rate increased to 19.4 percent
article_text: Poverty rates increased in Kentucky in 2012 and the state had one of the top five poverty rates in the United States at 19.4 percent, according to estimates released Thursday by the U.S. Census Bureau.

article_metadata.news-keywords: poverty, rates, census, bureau, child, children, survey
